items.headline: My husband sold his IRA without my knowledge prior to our divorce. Is this legal?

items.headline: Don’t let Apple’s stock dip fool you. The iPhone 17 could power a big rally.

items.headline: Oxford Industries says new Lilly Pulitzer offerings are winning over shoppers, but its Tommy Bahama line is lagging
items.summary_en: Resort-style clothing maker Oxford Industries Inc. on Wednesday offered up mixed second-quarter results and third-quarter expectations, and said that while new Lilly Pulitzer offerings were attracting shoppers, its Tommy Bahama line wasn’t.

items.headline: Oracle’s stock just did something never before seen on Wall Street. Inside that historic move.
items.summary_en: No company worth over $500 billion has ever gained more than 25% in a single day. Oracle’s stock increased by far more than that on Wednesday.
